"The Block Teleporter":
"Each Ship is divided into several medium-sized lobbies called \"Blocks\", which are categorised based on their intended purpose.

The \"Block Teleporter\" is a Teleporter that lets you move from one block to another."

"If you select a block that matches your level and intentions, you are more likely to meet players doing the same things as you.

You may want to move to a specific block to make it easier to find people.

The orange gauge next to each block name shows how full that block is. You cannot move to a block if it is completely full."
